page.title: 08Wooler Show
page.content:
Wooler Show is held on the Bank Holiday at the end of August, in Hussars Field, to the south of the town.The first cups were presented in 1923.There are now many more classes for flowers and the agricultural side of the Show has grown.Clay pigeon shooting and quoit competions have been introduced.You can have crane rides,visit joke stalls and enter fancy dress competions.
Show day begins before 7am. for the organisers.After all the entries have been received, the judging begins and lasts for over two hours.The main tent is then opened to the public. Various events take place during the afternoon until the Show closes at 5pm.
